description: In the romantic setting of an 18C farmhouse, this restaurant has a rustic dining room enhanced by its elegant decor and furnishings, such as the solid maple tables and refined cutlery. The cuisine is showcased on two tasting menus (from which dishes can also be chosen individually) which are creative and occasionally very elaborate in style.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
